section.title: AdhocTaskdefTask
section.para: The AdhocTaskdefTask allows you to define a task within your build file.

row.entry: Name of XML tag that will represent this task

example.title: AdhocTaskdefTask Examples
example.programlisting:
<target name="main"
        description="==>test AdhocTask ">

        <adhoc-task name="foo"><![CDATA[
            class FooTest extends Task {
                private $bar;

                function setBar($bar) {
                    $this->bar = $bar;
                }

                function main() {
                    $this->log("In FooTest: " . $this->bar);
                }
            }
        ]]></adhoc-task>

        <foo bar="B.L.I.N.G"/>
</target>
example.para: Note that you should use <![CDATA[ ... ]]> so that you don't have to quote entities within your <adhoc-task></adhoc-task> tags.
